title: This is the reason!

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
This is the reason Riot gives us themed skins.

Few feelings in league are better than this sense of unity, and imagining what the other team is thinking in the load screen. You just cant help smiling.

Ahhh i love it, thank you Riot!

replies.body:
You won because your teamcomp is cancerous champions.
Lee, Zyra, Vayne, Jax, Zed.
lol.

You're not wrong! I do feel guilty...

Unfortunately we cant choose the champs that belong to a theme, and unfortunately this was the only theme that didn't have overlaps in people only having 1 skin and it being the same skin.

SKT is far from my favourite thing in the world, but it makes for a pretty impressive themed team in game.

Unfortunately not, that would have been amazing.

This one sort of did though:

http://imgur.com/a/BxF9g
Getting a full skin team randomly would be the bees knees

i vsed a 5-man of project skins who all said
"PROJECT: ONLINE" at the beginning

then my 5 man flamed the shit out of them all game, and once we won, we typed:
"PROJECT: OFFFLINE"

THAT is more satisfying than winning as a theme team
